0010101110110101 0110011111110010 0 -> sum: 1001001110100111, cout: 0
0011000010110001 0100111110011001 0 -> sum: 1000000001001010, cout: 0
0000001110001110 0100111001111000 0 -> sum: 0101001000000110, cout: 0
0111000010011000 0001100111111001 0 -> sum: 1000101010010001, cout: 0
1010110000111001 1111011100001111 1 -> sum: 1010001101001001, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
